name: Little Star
description:
Little Star

Help our lost little star survive!
After a crash landing it's hungry & only our earth can help, but beware many huge animals are going to try to nom you, so eat up all your smaller enemies to become the big star you are.

Instructions:

Move your star with the left & right arrow key and use space to jump & avoid bigger enemies.
